string.text: crawnling mist
Spiders! Get that! I am the last one to laugh
Guys, it's relatively safe now
I can't stand spiders even more now!
This was terrifying! How did I survive?
I have seen everything now...
These spiders will come to me in nightmares!
What the hell just happened?!
That's it! I am going back
Haha, not today, Zone! I am ready to take on any challenges
Wah, It's over. I hope it never happens again
Why do I see so many spiders?
Guys, is it just me or the fog is abnormally thick?
I feel like something bad is about to happen...
Guys, I had a nightmare today about spiders. Do you think it's a sign?
This fog send chills down my spine
I feel like I will need my gun very soon...
Hey, I hear some weird noises from afar
Watch out! The spiders are coming!
Shoot them! Shoot them all!
Keep distance! Don't let the spiders come closer!
Punch thema nd kick them! They are weak for physical attacks
Aaaaaaarh! It bit me! I don't feel well...
Come here, bastards! I will make some cheese out of you!
These big spiders are so sturdy!
We don't have time to relax! Even more spiders are coming this way!
Damn! I can't endure it anymore!
These spiders are so squichy! The quantity, though...
I am cornered, but I won't give up!
It is life and death game of tag. Let's see who ends up on top!
I just can't die here! Not today!
Watch your six! Another crowd is approaching from the back!
Stick together, guys! Teamwork is the key to surviving!
Hell no! I am not going there!
It is time to test my new gun!
It is over! It is the end for us!
I knew it! There's no such thing as a free lunch. This is the price I have to pay.
Emissions, psi-storms and now this?! I am out.
